ActCanadian Human Rights Act
PrecisReappointment of ATHANASIOS HADJIS, of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Canadian Human Rights Tribunal to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective January 7, 2005.
